text: Halacaridae is a family of meiobenthic mites found in marine, brackish, and freshwater habitats around the world. It includes more than 1100 described species belonging to 64 genera ==Genera== * Werthelloides Bartsch, 1986 * Winlundia Newell, 1984 * Xenohalacarus Otto, 2000 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Halacaridae
